definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: break in two, divide (NH in der. forms; As. parâsu, divide, hinder; Ar. fa0risu break neck, etc.; Syr. farasa hoof, Targum [[פַּרְסְחָא]] (v. [[פַּרְסָה]] infr.); cf. Nö:ZA i.417 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וּפָֽרְשׂוּ]] Mic 3:3 they have broken up bones, as in kettle (?rd. Impf. [[וַיִפְרְשׂוּ]] Nö:i.c.); Inf. abs. [[פָּרׂס לָרָעֵב לַחְמְֶָ]] Is 58:7 a breaking for the hungry thy bread, so Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִפְרְסוּ]] [[לָהֶם]] Je 16:7 ([[לֶחֶם]] om.; but read [[לֶחֶם אֶל־אָבֵל]] ´[[יִפ]] Gie, cf. [in part] LXX Valgate Gf); Pt. [[פׂרֵשׂ לֶהֶם]] La 4:4 (acc. [[לֶחֶם]] om.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הִפְרִיסָה]] Le 11:6, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַפְרִיס]] v:Le 11:5; Pt. [[מַפְרִיס]] v:Le 11:4 +, [[מַפְרֶסֶת]] v:Le 11:3 +, etc.;—

c. acc. [[פַּרְסָה]] divide hoof, i.e. have divided hoof (> denom. have hoofs, De 14:6, De 14:7, De 14:8 and ‖ Le 11:3, Le 11:4, Le 11:5, Le 11:6, Le 11:7, so also Le 11:26; [[מַפְרִיסֵי]] ´[[הַפ]] De 14:7 = ´[[מַפְרִסֵי הַפ]] Le 11:4 (H).
pt. abs. denom. Ps 69:32 having hoofs (+ [[מַקְרִן]]).
